structure.unit: Sec. 11-2075. - EMERGING FROM ALLEY OR PRIVATE DRIVEWAY.

law.catch_line: EMERGING FROM ALLEY OR PRIVATE DRIVEWAY.
law.text: The driver of a vehicle emerging from an alley, driveway, or building shall stop that vehicle immediately prior to driving on to a sidewalk or into a sidewalk area across any alleyway, and upon entering the roadway shall yield the right-of-way to all vehicles approaching on the roadway. (Code 1959 , ยง21-18)
